A4.text: The Tar Heels have been selected to the NCAA Tournament 53 times (second-most all-time)

A5.text: The Bruins have appeared in the NCAA tournament 52 times

A6.text: The Blue Devils have appeared in the NCAA tournament 47 times

A7.text: Kentucky has 59 NCAA Tournament Appearances (NCAA rank No. 1)
